name: Fuzzy Finder
description: Find files and directories in Ulauncher using fzf

preferences.name: Alt+Enter action
preferences.description: Set the preferred behaviour for Alt+Enter.

preferences.name: Search type
preferences.description: Set what entries Fuzzy Finder should search for.

preferences.name: Allow hidden files and directories
preferences.description: Set whether hidden files and directories should be included when searching.

preferences.name: Follow symbolic links
preferences.description: Set whether to follow symlinked directories.

preferences.name: Trim displayed path name
preferences.description: Trim common path prefix from results. E.g. results '/path/to/filename/file1' and '/path/to/filename/file2' are displayed as '.../filename/file1' and '.../filename/file2'

preferences.name: Result limit
preferences.description: Number of results that should be returned.

preferences.name: Base search directory
preferences.description: The base directory to search for files.

preferences.name: Path to ignore-file
preferences.description: Path to a custom ignore-file in '.gitignore' format for files or directories to ignore.
